Articles.Content:
Using a LRO recreation, I found an anomaly at the South Pole of The Mun.
I dispatched 2 kerbals to explore it, and I found a crashed flying saucer. 

PICTURE HERE SHORTLY
NVM THE QUALITY IS CANCER

A few other important things.
(In order of how I discovered them)

1. Despite all my attempts, my orbit was STILL misaligned with the landing zone
2. I decelerated too aggressively, and landed 6 km short.
3. My way point was 900m away from the flying saucer
4. Walking is slow, I should be more frugal with RCS.
5. I forgot to pack Surface experiments.
6. I brang too little fuel, I had to have kerbals push the Lander and CM the rest of the way.
7. I do not have fun when 6 major things go wrong in my mission.

Edited July 7, 2021 by Wizard Kerbal
Having 6 major things go wrong in a mission is pretty much normal.
